welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sandy Springs, where southern charm meets modern sophistication! Explore our beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and delicious dining options as you immerse yourself in all the city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Ray's on the River
restaurants.description: Ray's on the River is a seafood restaurant located in Sandy Springs.
restaurants.address: 6700 Powers Ferry Rd, Sandy Springs, GA 30339
